name: Chemical Shielding Tactics
description: Defensive measures to protect against chemical exposure, toxic gas attacks, and corrosive agents.

cards.title: Chemical Barrier Protection Techniques
cards.description: Strategies for shielding against hazardous chemical exposure using specialized materials.
cards.bulletpoints: Activated carbon filters, chemical-resistant suits, barrier creams

cards.title: Neutralization of Toxic Chemical Agents
cards.description: Using counteragents and neutralizers to mitigate the effects of chemical exposure.
cards.bulletpoints: Oxidizing agents, pH neutralization, decontamination foams

cards.title: Emergency Evacuation & Containment Strategies
cards.description: Rapid response planning for chemical spills, gas leaks, and mass contamination events.
cards.bulletpoints: Containment zone setup, gas dispersal tactics, emergency egress planning
